alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:40PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pueblo County through 215 PM MDT... At 139 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 11 miles south of Avondale, or 21 miles southeast of Pueblo, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Pueblo County. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
